articles.title: Charles Schwab (SCHW): Valuation Check After Forge Global Deal, Crypto Plans and Platform Upgrades
articles.mainIdea: Charles Schwab (SCHW): Valuation Check After Forge Global Deal, Crypto Plans and Platform Upgrades
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Charles Schwab (SCHW): Valuation Check After Forge Global Deal, Crypto Plans and Platform Upgrades. Charles Schwab (SCHW) just strung together a series of strategic moves that have investors paying attention, from acquiring Forge Global to planning spot crypto trading and rolling out deeper upgrades across its trading platforms. See our latest analysis for Charles Schwab. Those moves are landing in a market that already likes the story, with the share price at $101.18 and a year to date share price return of 37.03 percent, underpinned by a 1 year total shareholder return of 36.85 percent...
